title: Strength: Forehand Swinging Volley
detail: When using this shot, point win rate is +23.3% vs baseline. Evidence: N=16

title: Weakness: Backhand Lob
detail: When using this shot, point win rate is -21.0% vs baseline. Evidence: N=55

title: Weakness: Forehand Half Volley
detail: When using this shot, point win rate is -17.4% vs baseline. Evidence: N=23
